author: Abraham Lincoln
quotes: You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today.

author: Edgar Allan Poe
quotes: Believe nothing you hear and only one half that you see.

author: William Wordsworth
quotes: The flower that smells the sweetest is shy and lowly.

author: Socrates
quotes: I know that I am intelligent, because I know that I know nothing.

author: Mark Twain
quotes: Kindness is the language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.

author: Plato
quotes: Wise men speak because they have something to say; Fools because they have to say something.

author: Benjamin Franklin
quotes: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.

author: Gauthama The Lord Buddha
quotes: Do not judge yourself harshly. Without mercy for ourselves we cannot love the world.

author: Mahatma Gandhi
quotes: Our greatest ability as humans is not to change the world, but to change ourselves.

author: William Shakespeare
quotes: Go wisely and slowly. Those who rush stumble and fall.

author: Marie Curie
quotes: Be less curious about people and morea curious about ideas.

author: Isaac Newton
quotes: What we know is a drop, what we don't know is an ocean.

author: Aristotle
quotes: Educating the mind without education the heart is no education at all.

author: Epictetus
quotes: It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.

author: William Shakespeare
quotes: Have more than you show, Speak less than you know

author: Confucius
quotes: A great man is hard on himself; a small man is hard on others.

author: Laozi
quotes: Those who understand others are clever, those who understand themselves are wise.

author: Emily Dickinson
quotes: Dogs are better than human beings because they know but do not tell.

author: Henry Fielding
quotes: Make money your god, and it will plague you like the devil.

author: Socrates
quotes: Falling down is not a failure. Failure comes when you stay where you have fallen.

author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
quotes: If you want to make life easy, make it hard.

author: Gauthama The Lord Buddha
quotes: Every experience, no matter how bad it seems, holds within it a blessing of some kind. The goal is to find it.

author: William Wordsworth
quotes: Relationships are base on four principles. Respect, Understanding, Acceptance and Appreciation.

author: Alexander Graham Bell
quotes: The achievement of one goal should be the starting point of another.

author: Romain Rolland
quotes: A hero is a man who does what he can.

author: Confucius
quotes: Our greatest glory is not in never failing, but in rising every time we fall.

author: Loazi
quotes: One who believes has no need to convince others.

author: Abraham Lincoln
quotes: We can complain because rose bushes have thorns, or rejoice because thorn bushes have roses.

author: Albert Einstein
quotes: The only thing more dangerous than ignorance is arrogance.

author: Galileo Galilei
quotes: All truths are easy to understand once they are discovered; the point is to discover them.

author: Gottfried Leibniz
quotes: Take what you need, do what you should, you will get what you want.

author: Rene Descartes
quotes: Conquer yourself rather than the world.

author: Paul The Apostle
quotes: Bad company ruins good morals.

author: Rudolf Virchow
quotes: Belief begins where science leaves off and ends where science begins.

author: R. Buckminster Fuller
quotes: How often I found where I should be going only by setting out for somewhere else.

author: Charles Dickens
quotes: A very little key will open a very heavy door.

author: Ernest Bramah
quotes: Where the road bends abruptly, take short steps.

author: James Boswell
quotes: in every picture there should be shade as well as light.

author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning
quotes: Silence is the best response to a fool.

author: Franklin Pierce
quotes: If your past is limited, your future is boundless.

author: Karl Max
quotes: The production of too many useful things results in too many useless people.

author: Isaac newton
quotes: My powers are ordinary. Only my application brings me success.

author: Stella Adler
quotes: Life beats down and crushes the soul and art reminds you that you have one.

author: George Sand
quotes: There is only one happiness in life, to love and be loved.

author: Democritus
quotes: It is hard to fight desire; but ot control it is the sign of a reasonable man.

author: Sain Augustine
quotes: Attract them by the way you live.

author: Confucius
quotes: A man is great not because he hasn't failed; a man is great because failure hasn't stopped him.

author: George Washington
quotes: Where there is no vision, there is no hope.

author: Leonardo da Vinci
quotes: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.

author: Florence Nightingale
quotes: Live life when you have it. Life is a splendid gift-there is nothing small about it.
